descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: On May 31, 2007, LeBron James scored 48 points as Cleveland beat Detroit in Game 5 of the Eastern Conference finals.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (LeBron scores Cavs' final 25 to dominate Pistons) 2018/05/31 ESHEET SCEU

videos.headline: On This Date: LeBron scores Cavs' final 25 points.
